imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- WiFi signal strength icon with radiating waves in a modern style (wifi-signal.dim_128x128.png)
- Speed gauge or speedometer illustration showing fast download concept (speed-gauge.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Build a frontend interface where users can input their current WiFi settings and view personalized optimization tips to increase download speeds
Implement a speed testing feature that measures current download speed and tracks improvements over time

Design a creative, modern visual theme for the app with a cohesive color scheme, typography, and layout that conveys speed and network connectivity. Use energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless specifically requested) and ensure consistent styling across all components

new_feature_requests.summary: Create WiFi download speed optimization functionality
Create a backend actor that analyzes WiFi connection parameters and provides optimization recommendations to improve download speeds
